summary: Constructs a graph from one or several point sets by turning each point into a node and linking it to its k nearest neighbors (the node itself is included). When multiple sets are given, they are concatenated into a single graph with node IDs offset according to the sizes of preceding sets.
business_intent: Offers a preprocessing layer that converts raw point cloud tensors into a DGL graph structure, enabling graph neural networks to perform neighborâ€‘based message passing on segmented or batched point data.
